sources.title: FDA Nutrition Facts Label Guidelines
sources.description: Official US guidance on nutrition labeling standards and daily values

sources.title: WHO Global Strategy on Diet, Physical Activity and Health (2004)
sources.description: World Health Organization recommendations for healthy diets

sources.title: Dietary Guidelines for Americans 2020-2025

sources.description: EU scientific assessments of food additives and nutrients

sources.description: Evidence-based nutrition information from leading research institution

methodology_notes.scoring_algorithm: Evidence-based nutrient thresholds with ingredient classification
methodology_notes.confidence_calculation: Weighted by data completeness and source reliability
methodology_notes.limitations: General population guidelines, individual variation not accounted
